title: AI Wrappers
text:
CABBAGE


Citation Builder
We built CABBAGE for Kerala Agricultural University students to automatically format references according to their specific style requirements. It handles KAU, APA, and Harvard formats, saving hours of manual work.
This shows how we can solve your unique challenges with custom AI tools.

title: AI Wrappers
text:
How It Works
Tell us about your repetitive tasks or complex processes. We‚Äôll build a custom AI wrapper that handles the heavy lifting while you focus on what matters most.

WINE

    WINE (Web-based Interactive Network for Education) is a modern learning hub from 
    Statoberry LLP in association with the 
    Department of Agricultural Statistics, KAU.  
    It blends training modules, exercises, and resources into one simple platform
    so you can revisit, practise, and master data science concepts anytime.
  

  
    Designed for students, researchers, and professionals, WINE keeps learning 
    interactive, engaging, and accessible.
  
  








  

  
    
    
      
      
        Next-Gen Data Analysis with R and AI-Powered RAISINS
        September 2025

Data Science Foundation Training Program
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  Data Science Foundation in R
  7-Day Bootcamp
  
  ‚ûî
  Register Now

  
  



Data Science Foundation: 7-Day Bootcamp



Build your foundation in Data Science with R and unlock the power of data-driven insights.

Mode: Online
Duration: 7 Days (Daily 1.5 - 2 hrs sessions)
For: Undergraduates, Students

Certificate Provided ¬† | ¬† Hands-on Practice ¬† | ¬† Live Q&A





  
  
  
  Training Schedule
  7 Days | Daily 1.5 - 2 hours sessions | Online Mode
  







Day
Topics


Day 1
Introduction
Introduction to Data Science and R
Overview of Data Science: What is data science? Its applications across domains
Introduction to R: Installation, RStudio interface, R scripts vs console
Basic R operations: Arithmetic, objects, vectors
Hands-on: Writing your first R code, simple data manipulations


Day 2
Data Structures
Data Structures in R
Core structures: Vectors, matrices, data frames, lists, factors
Practical examples with student-friendly datasets
Hands-on: Creating and managing data frames, indexing, subsetting


Day 3
Data Handling
Data Import, Cleaning, and Visualization
Importing data: CSV, Excel, text files
Data wrangling: Handling missing values, renaming, recoding
Basic visualization: plot(), hist(), boxplot(), ggplot2 intro
Hands-on: Cleaning and exploring a real-world dataset


Day 4
EDA
Descriptive Statistics and Exploratory Data Analysis
Descriptive statistics: Mean, median, variance, SD, skewness, kurtosis
EDA: Patterns, outliers, correlations
Hands-on: Summary statistics with sample datasets


Day 5
Statistics
Statistical Inference
Concepts: Population vs sample, hypothesis testing, t-tests, chi-square
Confidence intervals: Meaning and interpretation
Hands-on: Hypothesis testing on real-life datasets


Day 6
Modeling
Regression and Prediction
Simple linear regression: Concept, interpretation, model fitting in R
Multiple regression: Adding more predictors
Hands-on: Predicting outcomes based on multiple factors
Intro to model diagnostics: Residual plots, R¬≤


Day 7
AI & Future
Introduction to AI & LLMs
What are LLMs?: Basics of large language models, how they are trained
Applications: Chatbots, literature summarization, automating data cleaning
Demo: Using AI tools for research and analysis
Hands-on: Intro to ellmer and ragnar packages in R
Wrap-up: Review of course, Q&A, feedback




  

  
  
  What You'll Learn
  
  
   R Programming Fundamentals
  Master the basics of R programming, from installation to advanced data structures and operations.
  
  
   Data Management Skills
  Learn to import, clean, and transform datasets for meaningful analysis.
  
  
   Data Visualization
  Create compelling visualizations to communicate your findings effectively using ggplot2 and base R.
  
  
   Statistical Analysis
  Understand and apply descriptive statistics, hypothesis testing, and exploratory data analysis.
  
  
   Predictive Modeling
  Build regression models to predict outcomes and understand model diagnostics.
  
  
   AI & Data Science
  Explore the role of AI and large language models in modern data science and analytics.
  
  
  
  
  
  
  Frequently Asked Questions
  
  
  Do I need prior programming experience?
  No programming experience required! We start from the very basics and build up gradually.
  
  
  What software do I need?
  You'll need R and RStudio (both free). We'll guide you through the installation process on Day 1.
  
  
  Will I get hands-on practice?
  Yes! Each session includes practical exercises with real-world datasets.
  
  
  Can I ask questions during the training?
  Absolutely! Each session includes live Q&A time for your questions and clarifications.
  
  
  Will I receive a certificate?
  Yes, you'll receive a certificate of completion for this Data Science Foundation training.
  
  
  What materials will be provided?
  All datasets, R scripts, slides, and reference materials will be shared with participants.

    Statoberry LLP
    
      Statoberry LLP, founded by a passionate group of statisticians, is redefining the way agricultural research engages with data science. 
      We are a forward-thinking analytics firm with a vision to transform complex datasets into insights that are approachable, meaningful, and true to our name ‚Äì a little bit sweet.

Mentored by the Department of Agricultural Statistics at Kerala Agricultural University (KAU), and incubated under the AgTech Launchpad (a joint initiative of NABARD, KAU, and Western Sydney University, Australia), Statoberry has been recognized by the Kerala Startup Mission. 
      
      At Statoberry LLP, we blend statistical expertise with cutting-edge technology to build platforms, APIs, and tools that support agricultural research, precision farming, and farmer‚Äìconsumer connectivity.

title: PAPAYA Academic Press
text:
About PAPAYA
  PAPAYA (Professional Assistance for Publishing Academics and Your Aspirations) Academic Press, the publishing division of Statoberry LLP, is dedicated to advancing agricultural education and research. we ensure every book meets rigorous quality standards set by subject matter specialists. our mission is barrier-free access: by offering open-access versions online, we empower researchers, educators, and students worldwide. our platforms are widely used by agricultural researchers for data analysis, and we actively promote books through our channels to reach a global audience.
  
    See what we offer
    Why publish with us
    Submit Proposal
  



  What we offer
  


  
    Rigorous Quality Assurance
    Manuscripts are reviewed and approved by subject matter specialists to ensure accuracy, relevance, and scholarly value.
  
  
    Professional Typesetting
    High quality formatting and layout design tailored for academic and research publications.
  
  
    Expert Proofreading
    Comprehensive editing by agricultural science experts to ensure clarity, precision, and consistency.
  
  
    Custom Cover Design
    attractive, professional covers that reflect the essence of your work and your audience.
  
  
    Open-Access Online Publishing
    We use github to publish works online. all works are freely available to promote global accessibility and open-source publishing.
  
  
    Publishing on Amazon KDP
    Paperback and hard-cover publishing with worldwide distribution through amazon, reaching a global audience.
  



  Our commitment to quality



  
    Expert Approval
    Only manuscripts approved by our subject matter specialists will be published.
  
  
    Barrier-free Knowledge
    We prioritise open-access publishing to remove financial and geographical barriers.
  
  
    High Standards
    Every publication undergoes stringent proofreading, typesetting, and design processes to ensure professional quality.
  
  
    Marketing your book
    We actively promote published books through our online data analysis platforms and channels to reach a wider audience.
  



  Why publish with PAPAYA?



  
    Excellence in Agriculture
    We focus on advancing agricultural education and practice through high-quality academic and research works.
  
  
    Ethical Publishing
    we prioritise disseminating knowledge, not profit, ensuring your work reaches a global audience without barriers.
  
  
    Global Accessibility
    Our free online platform ensures your research is accessible to readers across the globe, anywhere, anytime.
  
  
    Professional Support
    From manuscript review to amazon kdp publishing, we offer end-to-end assistance for your work.
  



  How PAPAYA works - at a glance
  A simple flow showing the journey from manuscript submission to open-access and KDP publication.



  
  



  

  
    Submit a Proposal
    Use the form below to submit your book proposal to PAPAYA, the publishing division of Statoberry LLP. After you submit, you‚Äôll see a confirmation message and our team will get back to you shortly.

    
      
        Loading‚Ä¶
      
    

    
      
      
        open form in new tab
      
      
      email us instead

Statoberry LLP, founded by a passionate group of statisticians, is redefining the way agricultural research engages with data science. We are a forward-thinking analytics firm with a vision to transform complex datasets into insights that are approachable, meaningful, and true to our name a little bit sweet.
Our journey is deeply rooted in academia and innovation. Statoberry is proudly mentored by the Department of Agricultural Statistics at Kerala Agricultural University (KAU), ensuring a strong foundation in scientific rigor and relevance. We have been incubated under the AgTech Launchpad, a joint initiative of NABARD, KAU, and Western Sydney University, Australia (WSU), which has empowered us to refine our ideas and bring them closer to real-world application. As a recognized startup under the Kerala Startup Mission, we continue to scale our solutions with the guidance, support, and ecosystem provided by the state‚Äôs premier innovation framework.
At Statoberry LLP, we blend statistical expertise with cutting-edge technology to build platforms, APIs, and tools that support agricultural research, precision farming, and farmer‚Äìconsumer connectivity. Our work reflects a single belief: that data science, when made simple and accessible, has the power to transform agriculture and create lasting impact.


We empower researchers, educators, and agricultural professionals with intelligent, user-friendly tools. Through AI-powered platforms and cutting-edge APIs, we simplify analytics so that every decision‚Äîfrom the research lab to the field can be evidence-based and impactful.



Our Vision at Statoberry LLP is to make data science in agriculture simple, accessible, and impactful by transforming complex data into actionable insights. We aspire to empower researchers with intuitive tools, support farmers with secure and transparent platforms, and advance agri-technology through intelligent APIs and precision solutions all while bridging academia and innovation to create a future where agriculture is sustainable, connected, and data-driven.






Services
Description




Online Analytics Platform
An intuitive, no-code environment blending R, Python, and AI for rapid analysis in agricultural science. RAISINS


Robotics & Precision Farming APIs
High-performance, vision-enabled APIs that integrate seamlessly with agricultural robotics and automation systems.


KissanFinder.com
A secure, encrypted platform connecting farmers directly to consumers‚Äîensuring transparency, trust, and traceable produce.


Custom Bots & Assistants
AI assistants that guide research workflows, provide data support, and streamline tasks.


Site & App Development
Beautiful, fast, and responsive websites and dashboards to showcase your labs, datasets, tools, and services.







Simplicity with Strength ‚Äî We make advanced analytics feel effortless‚Äîbut let you dig deeper when you need to.
Built for AgTech & Research ‚Äî All our tools are tailored to real-world agricultural workflows.
Designed to Inspire ‚Äî We believe great tools can be beautiful and intuitive‚Äîand delivered with a touch of delight.








  
    
      
    
    Mohammed Hisham M
    CTO & Co-Founder
    
     PhD student in Agricultural Statistics, specializing in statistical modeling, no code platforms, and research application development.
    
      
  
  
    
      
    
    Adv. Gopika P Gopinath
    Co-Founder
    
     MCA graduate and advocate overseeing administration, compliance, and operational management.

    Senior Data Scientist
    
      Senior Data Scientist developing no-code AI platforms for agricultural research and designing production grade applications.
    
  

  
    
      
    
    Jithin Chandran
    Data Scientist
    
     Data Scientist focusing on backend systems, automation, and cloud integration for Statoberry‚Äôs research products.
    
  

  
    
      
    
    Parthan Ravi
    Digital Marketing Lead
    
     Digital Marketing Lead managing outreach and social media; agriculture graduate and YouTuber with an audience of 80k+.
    
    
  

    
      
    
    Dr Adarsh V. S.
    QA strategist
    
     Assistant Professor of Agricultural Statistics and QA Strategist, ensuring methodological soundness, statistical rigor, and quality assurance in Statoberry‚Äôs research platforms.
    
   
  
 
    
      
    
    Dr Pratheesh P Gopinath
    Mentor
    
     Head of the Department of Agricultural Statistics, KAU; provides guidance on theory, research methodology, and academic rigor. The backbone of Statoberry, ensuring scientific depth and credibility.
    
    
  
  




Contact us for demos, project inquiries, or collaborations.

Statoberry LLP - sweet, simple, and powerful data science for agriculture.

At Statoberry LLP, we blend statistical expertise with cutting-edge technology to build platforms, APIs, and tools that support agricultural research, precision farming, and farmer‚Äìconsumer connectivity. We empower researchers, educators, and agricultural professionals with intelligent, user-friendly tools. Through AI-powered platforms and cutting-edge APIs, we simplify analytics so that every decision‚Äîfrom the research lab to the field can be evidence-based and impactful.



Our Vision at Statoberry LLP is to make data science in agriculture simple, accessible, and impactful by transforming complex data into actionable insights. We aspire to empower researchers with intuitive tools, support farmers with secure and transparent platforms, and advance agri-technology through intelligent APIs and precision solutions all while bridging academia and innovation to create a future where agriculture is sustainable, connected, and data-driven.

title: Our AI Assistants
text:
Custom AI Assistants for Workflows & Research


From research support to agriculture and event management our AI assistants are built for your domain. Simple, intelligent, and always available to guide your users and teams with exactly what they need.


Trusted by institutions, researchers, and professionals worldwide.

title: Data Science Consultancy
text:
data science consultancy
  we deliver tailored analytics, ai solutions, and research support to help institutions, agribusinesses, and researchers turn complex data into actionable insights ‚Äî from study design and advanced modelling to dashboards and decision support.
  
    start a project
    email us
  


what we do

  
    tailored analytics & modelling
    design and analyse trials (crd, rcbd, split-plot, sem, mixed models), power/sample size, and reproducible workflows.
  
  
    ai & ml solutions
    predictive modelling, nlp, recommendation, anomaly detection, and custom model wrappers for your use cases.
  
  
    precision agriculture & vision
    image-based detection, quality grading, yield estimation, and robotics-friendly apis for field operations.
  
  
    dashboards & decision support
    clean, reliable dashboards (quarto/shiny/streamlit) with automated reports and data validations.
  
  
    study design & biostatistics
    protocols, measurement frameworks, survey tools, kpis, and publication-ready tables/figures.
  
  
    data engineering
    pipelines, cleaning, metadata standards, and secure storage to keep analytics robust and auditable.
  



  talk to a consultant


how we work

  
    1 ¬∑ discovery
    clarify goals, data sources, constraints, and success metrics.
  
  
    2 ¬∑ proposal
    deliver scope, timeline, milestones, and pricing with clear deliverables.
  
  
    3 ¬∑ build
    iterate in short sprints with demos and feedback on real data.
  
  
    4 ¬∑ validate
    qa, reproducibility checks, and documentation for handover.
  
  
    5 ¬∑ deliver & support
    deployment, training, and ongoing support as needed.
  



  get a proposal
  prefer email? write to help@statoberry.com.


engagement options

  
    project-based
    fixed scope and timeline with milestone-based delivery.
  
  
    retainer
    ongoing analytics/ai support for teams that need steady velocity.
  
  
    advisory
    lightweight guidance, review, and audit of methods and results.
  



  contact us
  back to home

title: Sweet and simple data science - that‚Äôs Statoberry.
text:
Statoberry LLP is a pioneering data analytics company transforming the way agricultural research and practice embrace data science. We create intelligent, AI-powered tools and services that simplify complex analyses, empower decision-making, and connect stakeholders across the agricultural ecosystem. From advanced platforms for research, to secure farmer-consumer networks, to cutting-edge APIs for robotics and precision farming, Statoberry stands at the intersection of technology and agriculture-making data-driven solutions accessible, impactful, and future-ready.
        
        
          Explore
          Learn more
        
        Trusted by students and researchers worldwide.

        ‡¥Æ‡¥≤‡¥Ø‡¥æ‡¥≥‡¥Ç
      

      
      
        what is KIF?
        KIF (Kissan Finder) is a highly secure and trusted platform where any farmer can register for free. after registration, the KIF team completes verification. once verified, the farmer receives a login and password and a permanent KIF qr code.

        when someone scans this permanent qr code, they can view the farmer‚Äôs verified profile: contact details, photos of the farm, cultivation practices, certifications, and more. for every batch of produce sold, the farmer can easily add batch-specific details (harvest date, variety, inputs used, location, quantity, etc.) so buyers can trace each batch to its origin.

        
          permanent qr code usage: the same qr can be printed on product labels, shared digitally, or displayed in shops and markets. it always points to the farmer‚Äôs KIF profile and the latest batch records.
        

        why use KIF?
        
          free, verified identity: farmers join at no cost; profiles are verified by the KIF team to build trust.
          one qr for life: a permanent code that‚Äôs easy to print on labels, packs, or display boards.
          batch-level traceability: record details for each batch in minutes; buyers can see what they are purchasing.
          market visibility: a clean public profile with photos, practices, and certifications boosts reach and credibility.
          consumer confidence: scanning reveals authentic, up-to-date data from KIF‚Äôs secure database.
          fair trade and branding: transparent origin stories help justify price and build loyal customers.
          organization ready: cooperatives, fpos, and ngos can manage and showcase networks of verified farmers.
          security and control: login-based updates; farmers control what they publish while KIF safeguards data.
        
      

      
      
        KIF ‡¥é‡¥®‡µç‡¥§‡¥æ‡¥£‡µç?
        KIF (Kissan Finder) ‡¥Ü‡¥∞‡µÅ‡¥Ç ‡¥∏‡µó‡¥ú‡¥®‡µç‡¥Ø‡¥Æ‡¥æ‡¥Ø‡¥ø ‡¥∞‡¥ú‡¥ø‡¥∏‡µç‡¥±‡µç‡¥±‡µº ‡¥ö‡µÜ‡¥Ø‡µç‡¥Ø‡¥æ‡¥µ‡µÅ‡¥®‡µç‡¥®, ‡¥∏‡µÅ‡¥∞‡¥ï‡µç‡¥∑‡¥ø‡¥§‡¥µ‡µÅ‡¥Ç ‡¥µ‡¥ø‡¥∂‡µç‡¥µ‡¥æ‡¥∏‡¥Ø‡µã‡¥ó‡µç‡¥Ø‡¥µ‡µÅ‡¥Ç ‡¥Ü‡¥Ø ‡¥í‡¥∞‡µÅ ‡¥™‡µç‡¥≤‡¥æ‡¥±‡µç‡¥±‡µç‚Äå‡¥´‡µã‡¥Æ‡¥æ‡¥£‡µç. ‡¥∞‡¥ú‡¥ø‡¥∏‡µç‡¥ü‡µç‡¥∞‡µá‡¥∑‡¥®‡µÜ ‡¥§‡µÅ‡¥ü‡¥∞‡µç‚Äç‡¥®‡µç‡¥®‡µç KIF ‡¥ü‡µÄ‡¥Ç ‡¥™‡¥∞‡¥ø‡¥∂‡µã‡¥ß‡¥® ‡¥™‡µÇ‡¥∞‡µç‚Äç‡¥§‡µç‡¥§‡¥ø‡¥Ø‡¥æ‡¥ï‡µç‡¥ï‡µÅ‡¥Ç. ‡¥™‡¥∞‡¥ø‡¥∂‡µá‡¥æ‡¥ß‡¥®‡¥Ø‡µç‡¥ï‡µç‡¥ï‡µç ‡¥∂‡µá‡¥∑‡¥Ç ‡¥ï‡¥∞‡µç‚Äç‡¥∑‡¥ï‡¥®‡µç ‡¥≤‡µã‡¥ó‡¥ø‡µª, ‡¥™‡¥æ‡¥∏‡µç‚Äå‡¥µ‡µá‡¥°‡µç ‡¥ï‡µÇ‡¥ü‡¥æ‡¥§‡µÜ ‡¥í‡¥∞‡µÅ ‡¥∏‡µç‡¥•‡¥ø‡¥∞‡¥Ç fig qr ‡¥ï‡µã‡¥°‡µç ‡¥≤‡¥≠‡¥ø‡¥ï‡µç‡¥ï‡µÅ‡¥Ç.

        ‡¥à ‡¥∏‡µç‡¥•‡¥ø‡¥∞‡¥Ç qr ‡¥ï‡µã‡¥°‡µç ‡¥∏‡µç‡¥ï‡¥æ‡µª ‡¥ö‡µÜ‡¥Ø‡µç‚Äå‡¥§‡¥æ‡µΩ ‡¥ï‡¥∞‡µç‚Äç‡¥∑‡¥ï‡¥®‡µç‡¥±‡µÜ ‡¥∏‡µç‡¥•‡¥ø‡¥∞‡µÄ‡¥ï‡¥∞‡¥ø‡¥ö‡µç‡¥ö ‡¥™‡µç‡¥∞‡µä‡¥´‡µà‡µΩ‚Äî‡¥¨‡¥®‡µç‡¥ß‡¥™‡µç‡¥™‡µÜ‡¥ü‡¥æ‡¥®‡µÅ‡¥≥‡µç‡¥≥ ‡¥µ‡¥ø‡¥µ‡¥∞‡¥ô‡µç‡¥ô‡µæ, ‡¥´‡¥æ‡¥Ç ‡¥ö‡¥ø‡¥§‡µç‡¥∞‡¥ô‡µç‡¥ô‡µæ, ‡¥ï‡µÉ‡¥∑‡¥ø ‡¥∞‡µÄ‡¥§‡¥ø‡¥ï‡µæ, ‡¥∏‡µº‡¥ü‡µç‡¥ü‡¥ø‡¥´‡¥ø‡¥ï‡µç‡¥ï‡µá‡¥∑‡¥®‡µÅ‡¥ï‡µæ ‡¥§‡µÅ‡¥ü‡¥ô‡µç‡¥ô‡¥ø‚Äî‡¥ï‡¥æ‡¥£‡¥æ‡¥Ç. ‡¥ì‡¥∞‡µã ‡¥â‡¥§‡µç‡¥™‡¥æ‡¥¶‡¥® ‡¥¨‡¥æ‡¥ö‡µç‡¥ö‡µÅ‡¥Ç ‡¥µ‡¥ø‡¥±‡µç‡¥±‡µÅ‡¥™‡µã‡¥ï‡µÅ‡¥Æ‡µç‡¥™‡µã‡¥¥‡µÅ‡¥Ç, ‡¥ï‡µä‡¥Ø‡µç‡¥§‡µç‡¥§‡µç‡¥§‡¥ø‡¥®‡µç‡¥±‡µÜ ‡¥§‡µÄ‡¥Ø‡¥§‡¥ø, ‡¥á‡¥®‡¥™‡µç‡¥™‡µá‡¥∞‡µÅ‡¥ï‡¥≥‡µç‚Äç, ‡¥â‡¥™‡¥Ø‡µã‡¥ó‡¥ø‡¥ö‡µç‡¥ö ‡¥á‡µª‡¥™‡µÅ‡¥ü‡µç‡¥ü‡µÅ‡¥ï‡µæ, ‡¥∏‡µç‡¥•‡¥≤‡¥Ç, ‡¥Ö‡¥≥‡¥µ‡µç ‡¥§‡µÅ‡¥ü‡¥ô‡µç‡¥ô‡¥ø‡¥Ø ‡¥¨‡¥æ‡¥ö‡µç‡¥ö‡µç-‡¥∏‡µç‡¥™‡µÜ‡¥∏‡¥ø‡¥´‡¥ø‡¥ï‡µç ‡¥µ‡¥ø‡¥µ‡¥∞‡¥ô‡µç‡¥ô‡µæ ‡¥ï‡¥∞‡µç‚Äç‡¥∑‡¥ï‡¥®‡µç ‡¥é‡¥≥‡µÅ‡¥™‡µç‡¥™‡¥§‡µç‡¥§‡¥ø‡µΩ ‡¥ö‡µá‡µº‡¥ï‡µç‡¥ï‡¥æ‡¥Ç. ‡¥á‡¥§‡µã‡¥ü‡µÜ ‡¥ì‡¥∞‡µã ‡¥¨‡¥æ‡¥ö‡µç‡¥ö‡¥ø‡¥®‡µç‡¥±‡µÜ‡¥Ø‡µÅ‡¥Ç ‡¥â‡¥±‡¥µ‡¥ø‡¥ü‡¥Ç ‡¥â‡¥™‡¥≠‡µã‡¥ï‡µç‡¥§‡¥æ‡¥ï‡µç‡¥ï‡µæ‡¥ï‡µç‡¥ï‡µç ‡¥ü‡µç‡¥∞‡µÜ‡¥Ø‡µç‚Äå‡¥∏‡µç ‡¥ö‡µÜ‡¥Ø‡µç‡¥Ø‡¥æ‡¥Ç.

        
          ‡¥∏‡µç‡¥•‡¥ø‡¥∞‡¥Ç qr ‡¥ï‡µã‡¥°‡µç ‡¥â‡¥™‡¥Ø‡µã‡¥ó‡¥Ç: ‡¥í‡¥∞‡µá qr ‡¥ï‡µã‡¥°‡µç ‡¥â‡µΩ‡¥™‡µç‡¥™‡¥®‡µç‡¥® ‡¥≤‡µá‡¥¨‡¥≤‡¥ø‡µΩ ‡¥™‡µç‡¥∞‡¥ø‡¥®‡µç‡¥±‡µç ‡¥ö‡µÜ‡¥Ø‡µç‡¥Ø‡¥æ‡¥Ç, ‡¥°‡¥ø‡¥ú‡¥ø‡¥±‡µç‡¥±‡¥≤‡¥æ‡¥Ø‡¥ø ‡¥™‡¥ô‡µç‡¥ï‡¥ø‡¥ü‡¥æ‡¥Ç, ‡¥Ö‡¥≤‡µç‡¥≤‡µÜ‡¥ô‡µç‡¥ï‡¥ø‡µΩ ‡¥ï‡¥ü‡¥ï‡¥≥‡¥ø‡¥≤‡µÅ‡¥Ç ‡¥Æ‡¥æ‡µº‡¥ï‡µç‡¥ï‡¥±‡µç‡¥±‡µÅ‡¥ï‡¥≥‡¥ø‡¥≤‡µÅ‡¥Ç ‡¥™‡µç‡¥∞‡¥¶‡µº‡¥∂‡¥ø‡¥™‡µç‡¥™‡¥ø‡¥ï‡µç‡¥ï‡¥æ‡¥Ç. ‡¥á‡¥§‡µç ‡¥é‡¥≤‡µç‡¥≤‡¥æ‡¥Ø‡µç‡¥™‡µç‡¥™‡µã‡¥¥‡µÅ‡¥Ç ‡¥ï‡¥∞‡µç‚Äç‡¥∑‡¥ï‡¥®‡µç‡¥±‡µÜ fig ‡¥™‡µç‡¥∞‡µä‡¥´‡µà‡¥≤‡¥ø‡¥≤‡µá‡¥ï‡µç‡¥ï‡µÅ‡¥Ç ‡¥è‡¥±‡µç‡¥±‡¥µ‡µÅ‡¥Ç ‡¥™‡µÅ‡¥§‡¥ø‡¥Ø ‡¥¨‡¥æ‡¥ö‡µç‡¥ö‡µç ‡¥±‡µÜ‡¥ï‡µç‡¥ï‡µã‡µº‡¥°‡µÅ‡¥ï‡¥≥‡¥ø‡¥≤‡µá‡¥ï‡µç‡¥ï‡µÅ‡¥Æ‡¥æ‡¥£‡µç ‡¥™‡µã‡¥Ø‡¥ø‡¥®‡µç‡¥±‡µç ‡¥ö‡µÜ‡¥Ø‡µç‡¥Ø‡µÅ‡¥®‡µç‡¥®‡¥§‡µç.
        

        ‡¥é‡¥®‡µç‡¥§‡µÅ‡¥ï‡µä‡¥£‡µç‡¥ü‡µç fIF
        
          ‡¥∏‡µó‡¥ú‡¥®‡µç‡¥Ø, ‡¥™‡¥∞‡¥ø‡¥∂‡µá‡¥æ‡¥ß‡¥ø‡¥§ ‡¥ê‡¥°‡¥®‡µç‡¥±‡¥ø‡¥±‡µç‡¥±‡¥ø: ‡¥∞‡¥ú‡¥ø‡¥∏‡µç‡¥ü‡µç‡¥∞‡µá‡¥∑‡µª ‡¥∏‡µó‡¥ú‡¥®‡µç‡¥Ø‡¥Ç; fig ‡¥ü‡µÄ‡¥Ç ‡¥™‡µç‡¥∞‡µä‡¥´‡µà‡µΩ ‡¥™‡¥∞‡¥ø‡¥∂‡µã‡¥ß‡¥® ‡¥®‡¥ü‡¥§‡µç‡¥§‡¥ø ‡¥µ‡¥ø‡¥∂‡µç‡¥µ‡¥æ‡¥∏‡¥Ç ‡¥â‡¥±‡¥™‡µç‡¥™‡¥æ‡¥ï‡µç‡¥ï‡µÅ‡¥®‡µç‡¥®‡µÅ.
          ‡¥ú‡µÄ‡¥µ‡¥ø‡¥§‡¥ï‡¥æ‡¥≤ qr: ‡¥í‡¥∞‡µä‡¥±‡µç‡¥± ‡¥∏‡µç‡¥•‡¥ø‡¥∞‡¥Ç ‡¥ï‡µã‡¥°‡µç‚Äî‡¥≤‡µá‡¥¨‡¥≤‡µÅ‡¥ï‡¥≥‡¥ø‡¥≤‡µÅ‡¥Ç ‡¥™‡¥æ‡¥ï‡µç‡¥ï‡µÅ‡¥ï‡¥≥‡¥ø‡¥≤‡µÅ‡¥Ç ‡¥°‡¥ø‡¥∏‡µç‚Äå‡¥™‡µç‡¥≤‡µá ‡¥¨‡µã‡µº‡¥°‡¥ø‡¥≤‡µÅ‡¥Ç ‡¥é‡¥≥‡µÅ‡¥™‡µç‡¥™‡¥§‡µç‡¥§‡¥ø‡µΩ ‡¥™‡µç‡¥∞‡¥ø‡¥®‡µç‡¥±‡µç ‡¥ö‡µÜ‡¥Ø‡µç‡¥Ø‡¥æ‡¥Ç.
          ‡¥¨‡¥æ‡¥ö‡µç‡¥ö‡µç-‡¥§‡¥≤ ‡¥ü‡µç‡¥∞‡µÜ‡¥Ø‡µç‚Äå‡¥∏‡¥¨‡¥ø‡¥≤‡¥ø‡¥±‡µç‡¥±‡¥ø: ‡¥ì‡¥∞‡µã ‡¥¨‡¥æ‡¥ö‡µç‡¥ö‡¥ø‡¥®‡µç‡¥±‡µÜ‡¥Ø‡µÅ‡¥Ç ‡¥µ‡¥ø‡¥µ‡¥∞‡¥ô‡µç‡¥ô‡µæ ‡¥Æ‡¥ø‡¥®‡¥ø‡¥±‡µç‡¥±‡µÅ‡¥ï‡µæ‡¥ï‡µç‡¥ï‡µÅ‡¥≥‡µç‡¥≥‡¥ø‡µΩ ‡¥∞‡µá‡¥ñ‡¥™‡µç‡¥™‡µÜ‡¥ü‡µÅ‡¥§‡µç‡¥§‡¥ø; ‡¥â‡¥™‡¥≠‡µã‡¥ï‡µç‡¥§‡¥æ‡¥ï‡µç‡¥ï‡µæ ‡¥µ‡¥æ‡¥ô‡µç‡¥ô‡µÅ‡¥®‡µç‡¥®‡¥§‡µç ‡¥é‡¥®‡µç‡¥§‡¥æ‡¥£‡µÜ‡¥®‡µç‡¥®‡µç ‡¥µ‡µç‡¥Ø‡¥ï‡µç‡¥§‡¥Æ‡¥æ‡¥ï‡µç‡¥ï‡¥æ‡¥Ç.
          ‡¥Æ‡¥æ‡µº‡¥ï‡µç‡¥ï‡¥±‡µç‡¥±‡µç ‡¥¶‡µÉ‡¥∂‡µç‡¥Ø‡¥§: ‡¥ö‡¥ø‡¥§‡µç‡¥∞‡¥ô‡µç‡¥ô‡µæ, ‡¥∞‡µÄ‡¥§‡¥ø‡¥ï‡µæ, ‡¥∏‡µº‡¥ü‡µç‡¥ü‡¥ø‡¥´‡¥ø‡¥ï‡µç‡¥ï‡µá‡¥∑‡¥®‡µÅ‡¥ï‡µæ ‡¥Ö‡¥ü‡¥ô‡µç‡¥ô‡¥ø‡¥Ø ‡¥™‡¥¨‡µç‡¥≤‡¥ø‡¥ï‡µç ‡¥™‡µç‡¥∞‡µä‡¥´‡µà‡µΩ ‡¥µ‡¥ø‡¥∂‡µç‡¥µ‡¥æ‡¥∏‡µç‡¥Ø‡¥§‡¥Ø‡µÅ‡¥Ç ‡¥µ‡¥ø‡¥∏‡µç‡¥§‡¥æ‡¥∞‡¥µ‡µÅ‡¥Ç ‡¥µ‡µº‡¥ß‡¥ø‡¥™‡µç‡¥™‡¥ø‡¥ï‡µç‡¥ï‡µÅ‡¥®‡µç‡¥®‡µÅ.
          ‡¥â‡¥™‡¥≠‡µã‡¥ï‡µç‡¥§‡µÉ ‡¥Ü‡¥§‡µç‡¥Æ‡¥µ‡¥ø‡¥∂‡µç‡¥µ‡¥æ‡¥∏‡¥Ç: ‡¥∏‡µç‡¥ï‡¥æ‡µª ‡¥ö‡µÜ‡¥Ø‡µç‡¥§‡¥æ‡µΩ fig‡¥Ø‡µÅ‡¥ü‡µÜ ‡¥∏‡µÅ‡¥∞‡¥ï‡µç‡¥∑‡¥ø‡¥§ ‡¥°‡¥æ‡¥±‡µç‡¥±‡¥æ‡¥¨‡µá‡¥∏‡¥ø‡µΩ ‡¥®‡¥ø‡¥®‡µç‡¥®‡µÅ‡¥≥‡µç‡¥≥ ‡¥Ø‡¥•‡¥æ‡µº‡¥§‡µç‡¥•‡¥µ‡µÅ‡¥Ç ‡¥™‡µÅ‡¥§‡µÅ‡¥ï‡µç‡¥ï‡¥ø‡¥Ø‡¥§‡µÅ‡¥Æ‡¥æ‡¥Ø ‡¥°‡¥æ‡¥±‡µç‡¥± ‡¥ï‡¥æ‡¥£‡¥æ‡¥Ç.
          ‡¥´‡µÜ‡¥Ø‡µº ‡¥ü‡µç‡¥∞‡µá‡¥°‡µç & ‡¥¨‡µç‡¥∞‡¥æ‡µª‡¥°‡¥ø‡¥Ç‡¥ó‡µç: ‡¥µ‡µç‡¥Ø‡¥ï‡µç‡¥§‡¥Æ‡¥æ‡¥Ø ‡¥â‡¥§‡µç‡¥≠‡¥µ‡¥ï‡¥• ‡¥µ‡¥ø‡¥≤ ‡¥®‡µç‡¥Ø‡¥æ‡¥Ø‡µÄ‡¥ï‡¥∞‡¥ø‡¥ï‡µç‡¥ï‡¥æ‡¥®‡µÅ‡¥Ç ‡¥∏‡µç‡¥•‡¥ø‡¥∞‡¥Æ‡¥æ‡¥Ø ‡¥â‡¥™‡¥≠‡µã‡¥ï‡µç‡¥§‡¥æ‡¥ï‡µç‡¥ï‡¥≥‡µÜ ‡¥â‡¥£‡µç‡¥ü‡¥æ‡¥ï‡µç‡¥ï‡¥æ‡¥®‡µÅ‡¥Ç ‡¥∏‡¥π‡¥æ‡¥Ø‡¥ø‡¥ï‡µç‡¥ï‡µÅ‡¥®‡µç‡¥®‡µÅ.
          ‡¥ì‡µº‡¥ó‡¥®‡µà‡¥∏‡µá‡¥∑‡µª ‡¥±‡µÜ‡¥°‡¥ø: ‡¥∏‡¥π‡¥ï‡¥∞‡¥£‡¥∏‡¥Ç‡¥ò‡¥ô‡µç‡¥ô‡µæ, fpo, ngo ‡¥§‡µÅ‡¥ü‡¥ô‡µç‡¥ô‡¥ø ‡¥∏‡¥Ç‡¥ò‡¥ü‡¥®‡¥ï‡µæ‡¥ï‡µç‡¥ï‡µç ‡¥™‡¥∞‡¥ø‡¥∂‡µá‡¥æ‡¥ß‡¥ø‡¥§ ‡¥ï‡¥∞‡µç‚Äç‡¥∑‡¥ï‡¥∞‡µÅ‡¥ü‡µÜ ‡¥®‡µÜ‡¥±‡µç‡¥±‡µç‚Äå‡¥µ‡µº‡¥ï‡µç‡¥ï‡µç ‡¥í‡¥∞‡¥ø‡¥ü‡¥§‡µç‡¥§‡µç ‡¥§‡¥®‡µç‡¥®‡µÜ ‡¥ï‡µà‡¥ï‡¥æ‡¥∞‡µç‡¥Ø‡¥Ç ‡¥ö‡µÜ‡¥Ø‡µç‡¥Ø‡¥æ‡¥®‡µÅ‡¥Ç ‡¥™‡µç‡¥∞‡¥¶‡µº‡¥∂‡¥ø‡¥™‡µç‡¥™‡¥ø‡¥ï‡µç‡¥ï‡¥æ‡¥®‡µÅ‡¥Ç ‡¥ï‡¥¥‡¥ø‡¥Ø‡µÅ‡¥Ç.
          ‡¥∏‡µÅ‡¥∞‡¥ï‡µç‡¥∑‡¥Ø‡µÅ‡¥Ç ‡¥®‡¥ø‡¥Ø‡¥®‡µç‡¥§‡µç‡¥∞‡¥£‡¥µ‡µÅ‡¥Ç: ‡¥≤‡µã‡¥ó‡¥ø‡µª ‡¥Ö‡¥ü‡¥ø‡¥∏‡µç‡¥•‡¥æ‡¥®‡¥§‡µç‡¥§‡¥ø‡¥≤‡µÅ‡¥≥‡µç‡¥≥ ‡¥Ö‡¥™‡µç‚Äå‡¥°‡µá‡¥±‡µç‡¥±‡µÅ‡¥ï‡µæ; ‡¥™‡µç‡¥∞‡¥∏‡¥ø‡¥¶‡µç‡¥ß‡µÄ‡¥ï‡¥∞‡¥ø‡¥ï‡µç‡¥ï‡µÅ‡¥®‡µç‡¥®‡¥§‡µç ‡¥ï‡¥∞‡µç‚Äç‡¥∑‡¥ï‡¥®‡¥æ‡¥£‡µç ‡¥®‡¥ø‡¥Ø‡¥®‡µç‡¥§‡µç‡¥∞‡¥ø‡¥ï‡µç‡¥ï‡µÅ‡¥®‡µç‡¥®‡¥§‡µç, fig ‡¥°‡¥æ‡¥±‡µç‡¥± ‡¥∏‡¥Ç‡¥∞‡¥ï‡µç‡¥∑‡¥ø‡¥ï‡µç‡¥ï‡µÅ‡¥®‡µç‡¥®‡µÅ.

title: AI-Driven Research Platforms
text:
What We Build


Research Platforms
Complete web platforms with integrated AI tools and data management systems.


Agricultural Solutions
Farm planning, traceability systems, and agricultural analytics platforms.


Custom Analytics
Database management, automated reporting, and data visualization tools.

title: AI-Driven Research Platforms
text:
Recent Projects


COCOON - Farm Planning
AI-based farm plan calculation software developed in collaboration with Kerala Agricultural University. Automates complex agricultural planning decisions.


ICAR-DCR Platform
Complete web platform with integrated Telegram bot and web chatbot for ICAR-DCR Puttur, including deployment and ongoing support services.


RUBUS - Report System
Monthly report generation and database management system for College of Agriculture, Vellayani, KAU. Streamlines administrative workflows.

title: AI-Driven Research Platforms
text:
Our Approach
We collaborate closely with research institutions and organizations to build custom platforms that solve real problems and integrate seamlessly with existing workflows.

Data Analysis in Agricultural Research using R
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
 
  
  
  Next-Gen Data Analysis with R and AI-Powered RAISINS
  7-Day Online Training Programme
  
  ‚ûî
  Register Now
  

  
  




Next-Gen Data Analysis with R and AI-Powered RAISINS: 7-Day Training



Unlock advanced agricultural data analytics with R and elevate your research and professional skills.

Dates: December 5‚Äì11, 2025 (Online)
Timing: 7:00 PM ‚Äì 8:30 PM IST daily
For: Researchers, students, and professionals in agriculture and allied science.

Certificate Provided ¬† | ¬† Live Q&A





  
  
  
  Training Schedule
  December 5‚Äì11, 2025 | 7:00 PM ‚Äì 8:30 PM IST daily
  







Day
Topics


Day 1
Getting Started
Getting Started with R and RAISINS
Introduction to R: installation, setup, and basic workflow
Guided live document for smooth installation and orientation
Exploring RAISINS: overview, navigation, and capabilities


Day 2
Foundations
Foundations of Experimental Design and Analysis
Principles of design of experiments (DOE)
Creating experimental layouts in R and RAISINS
Analysis of experimental data and interpretation of results


Day 3
Relationships
Statistical Relationships and Modelling
Descriptive statistics and data summarization
Correlation and regression analysis (simple and multiple)
Introduction to logistic regression and interpretation in research contexts


Day 4
Multivariate
Multivariate Exploratory Techniques
Introduction to exploratory data analysis in agriculture and allied fields
Principal Component Analysis (PCA): concepts and applications
Cluster analysis and factor analysis: grouping and latent variable discovery


Day 5
Relationships
Advanced Designs in Agricultural Research
Factorial experiments: concepts, layout, and interpretation
Split-plot and strip-plot designs: when and how to use them
Practical demonstrations with real datasets


Day 6
Genetics
Statistical Genetics and Advanced Techniques
Introduction to statistical genetics
Path analysis and stability analysis for genotype evaluation
Variance components and heritability estimation


Day 7
Visualization
Data Visualization and No-Code Analytics
Best practices in data visualization for agricultural research
Generating impactful graphs and plots in R
Leveraging RAISINS for no-code data analysis and visualization

  Frequently Asked Questions
  
  
  Do I need prior experience in R?
  No. Day 1 begins with R basics‚Äîbeginners are welcome.
  
  
  Will I get training materials?
  Yes, all datasets, slides, and scripts will be shared post-session.
  
  
  Can I attend online?
  Yes, the full program is online/virtual.
  
  
  How do I get my certificate?
  Certificates will be provided through the dedicated training platform.
